scripts.ocd-scmsecret: ls ~/.ssh/become-a-teacher_rsa | sed 's/^/ssh-privatekey=/1' | xargs ocd scmsecret  | grep '^oc' | sh
scripts.ocd-create-dotnet-dbaas: cat search-and-compare-api-properties.yaml dbaas-properties.yaml > dbaas.tmp ; ocd parameters -t dotnet-dbaas -c dbaas.tmp | oc process -f dotnet-dbaas.json --param-file=-  |  oc create -f - ; rm dbaas.tmp
scripts.ocd-status: oc project ; git status | fgrep 'On branch'
scripts.ocd-switch: git checkout $OCD_BRANCH ; oc project $OCD_PROJECT; git secret list | xargs rm ; git secret reveal
